titleInfo.title: W. Lee O'Daniel and his Light Crust Doughboys - Memories Of Jimmie Rodgers - Vocalion 02605 dub

mods.abstract: Content appears to be a dub of W. Lee O'Daniel and his Light Crust Doughboys's 'Memories Of Jimmie Rodgers', released as Vocalion 02605.
